mapper.select: select doc.* , usr.ui_name from APPD_DOC doc left outer join user_info usr on doc.ad_ui_id = usr.ui_id where doc.AD_ID = #{value}
mapper.update: update APPD_DOC set AD_DEPT = #{adDept}, AD_TITLE = #{adTitle}, AD_CONTENT = #{adContent}, AD_REGDATE = sysdate, AD_APPD = #{adAppd}, AD_PROCESS = #{adProcess}, where AD_ID = #{adId}
mapper.delete: update APPD_DOC set AD_APPD_SIGN = 1 , AD_APPD = '결재완료' where AD_ID = #{value}
